item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1705; 10:06PM; 227 N Berendo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TrADHu; #Koreatown; 40 Firefighters took just 44 minutes to access, confine and extinguish stubborn deep-seated fire within the *first* floor walls of a twelve unit 10,260 square foot two-story center hallway apartment building with basement. Built 1928. No injury. Undetermined if residents will be displaced by fire damage. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC5 EA1 E220 E235 E29 E52 E6 RA52 RA6 T20 T29 T35; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1705; 09:22PM; 227 N Berendo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TrADHu; #Koreatown; PRELIM: 100' x 25 two-story center hallway apartment building (also has "basement") with apparent fire on the second (top) floor and smoke on both (above ground) floors.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E220 E235 E52 E6 RA6 T20 T35; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Contained - Brush Fire; INC#1277; 05:41PM; 368 S Av 60; MAP: https://bit.ly/3R8JgWi; #HighlandPark; 57 LAFD Firefighters responding by ground and air, joined by South Pasadena FD in Automatic Aid, took just 60 minutes to access, confine and extinguish 2.5 (two and one-half ) acres of burning grass. No injury. No infra/structure damage. No evacuation. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC13 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E12 E16 E212 E290 E42 E44 E47 E55 E90 EM11 H1 H3 H5 HA1 HA3 HA5 RA12 T12 T90 + South Pasadena FD Engine 81; CH5; 13; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1277; 04:41PM; 368 S Av 60; MAP: https://bit.ly/3R8JgWi; #HighlandPark; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response with South Pasadena FD Engine 81 in Automatic Aid to a now estimated one acre of grass burning with light wind. No imminent structure threat at nearby mobile home park. No evacuation.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC2 E1 E12 E16 E212 E290 E44 E47 E55 E90 EM11 H1 H3 H5 HA1 HA3 HA5 RA12 T12 T90 + South Pasadena FD E81; CH5; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1477; 10:45PM; 255 S Hill St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pSepAB; Downtown; Firefighters ascended to the 8th floor of a 16 story high-rise and located a fire in one unit being held in check by the fire sprinklers (reported as a vacuum cleaner which sparked and started a fire). While a few residents self-evacuated, the rest of the building is sheltering in place. There is only light smoke in the hallway. There will be a water removal operation due to the sprinkler activation. No injuries reported. No further details and no further updates anticipated. ; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E11 E203 E210 E4 E9 RA3 SQ21 T10 T3; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0624; 12:42PM; 10347 W Mccormick St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qa0BBX; North Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire with no injuries reported. Note: This incident was originally dispatched with a BLS ambulance as an 'injury' call at 11:53AM. The ambulance was on standby at the address for LAPD. Approximately 30 minutes into the standby, the crew reported a working structure fire in the unit. The incident was then upgraded to a structure fire response and a knockdown was gained approximately 12 mins later. Any queries as to the nature of the call within the unit prior to the fire is referred to LAPD Inc# 1652. No further details.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E27 E289 RA86 RA860 T60 T89; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0624; 11:53AM; 10347 W Mccormick St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qa0BBX; North Hollywood; Two story, single family dwelling with fire showing from one room on the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; RA860; CH8; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0073; 01:20AM; 624 N Beaudry Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3csWGNe; Chinatown; KNOCKDOWN: 34 Firefighters knocked down the bulk of the fire from the exterior and then transitioned to an offensive operation with two companies making an interior fire attack, achieving full knockdown in 14 mins. There are no injuries reported. ; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E20 E201 E211 E220 E4 T1 T11 T20; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0073; 01:06AM; 959 N Beaudry Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ASgeno; Echo Park; One story, single family dwelling (vacant) well involved in fire with at least one additional building exposed (also vacant). There is an electrical hazard (wires) in front. Firefighters are in the defensive mode. ; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E20 E201 E211 E220 E4 T1 T11 T20; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#0930; 04:18PM; Wb 118 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/38MPhGK; Chatsworth; FINAL UPDATE: Fire area estimated at 10 acres with 100% containment. All air resources are released while ground resources will continue the mop up operation to ensure no hot spots remain. No further details.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC12 BC15 BC17 BC9 CE83 CE84 CM40 CM42 E100 E104 E105 E106 E107 E18 E24 E287 E290 E39 E70 E73 E8 E83 E84 E88 E90 E91 E93 E98 EM15 H1 H3 H4 H5 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA5 HT1 RA104 RA70 RA72 RI600 T87 T90 WT88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart
